title: [FANART] I drew Lux at 100% Luminescence
body: Thanks for all the support guys, this is my best work yet. I hope this is enough to get me into Riot's Art and Design Team.

replies.body:
All i see is LeBlanc.

Get it? Because LeBlanc means "the white" in french.

https://media2.giphy.com/media/bQCWmEgKHasZG/giphy.gif

######Ok fine, I'm leaving

I actually laughed
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Are you French? Because I still have the Katarina DuBateau meme. Because I'm French and I'm noticing an odd influx of French jokes from you.

I am. French Canadian to be precise 

http://cdn.playbuzz.com/cdn/47658333-f750-4506-8d07-626d8f8e7da5/5cdbf727-04f5-4a49-8b06-3e9c47fa264e.gif
Je suis Canadien aussi mon ami.
Cool, est-tu quebecois par hasard?
Non. Je viens un peut de l'ouest.
Ah ok, c'est cool tout de même.

Aussi mon francais n'est pas de toute pafait parce que je suis dans l'école, allors... Well even this was hard to write let's just say that much. I have to find so many work a rounds because I'm never sure about a lot of words.
https://33.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m78llsih4k1rq09pxo2_500.gif
At least I can speak clearly and kind of hold a conversation. But that's based off the people in my class, and they can be described with this nice rhyme. Bete dans la tete.

>Bete dans la tete

What a coincidence, this describes the posts in gameplay too!
So true. Also I think this is a record. We have a chat streak of 11 messages here. Excluding that one random guy with his meme.
Same, usually when I comment something it ends up with 3 messages at maximum in a conversation.

Yeah sounds about right. Also, I just had a real odd coincidence. I was having issues so I made a support ticket, every week I have to swap houses because obvious reasons, and therefore computers. I got the reply a week later when I was back at the computer having the issue.
Wow, impressive! I would like to see more art of yours. How long would it take you to draw a sketch of Nocturn at midnight?
About a couple hours, but by then it wouldn't be midnight.
http://i.imgur.com/AKZVFuP.gif[\img]
This looks similar to my lewd picture of Vayne mid-ult. Did you steal my OC?
"All the support".  Lux.  lulz
Nice, now do a pic of {{champion:56}}? Kappa
